name: docsy

scripts._prepare: npm run _cp:bs-rfs && npm run _refresh-forward-sass-var && npm run _gen-chroma-styles && npm run get:hugo-modules
scripts.check:format: npm list prettier && npm run _check:format || (echo '[help] Run: npm run fix:format'; exit 1)
scripts.check: npm run check:format && npm run check:markdown
scripts.ci:post: npm run fix:format && npm run _diff:check && npm run test:tooling
scripts.ci:prepare: npm run docsy.dev-install && npm run _prepare && npm run _diff:check
scripts.ci:test: npm run ci:prepare && npm run check && npm run test:website && npm run ci:post
scripts.fix-and-test: echo 'RUNNING FIX AND TESTS...'; npm run fix && npm run test:website
scripts.fix:format: npm run _check:format -- --write && npm run cd:docsy.dev fix:format
scripts.fix: npm run fix:format && npm run fix:version && npm run cd:docsy.dev fix
scripts.update:packages: npx npm-check-updates -x @fortawesome/fontawesome-free -u && npm run cd:docsy.dev update:packages

spelling: cSpell:ignore docsy hugo fortawesome fontawesome onedark -
